G1140.def: an evil supernatural being or spirit

G1497.def: an object which resembles a person, animal, god, etc. and which is an object of worship{N:001}

G5470.def: (derivative of {L:χαλκός<SDBG:χαλκός:000000>}[a] ‘bronze, brass, copper,’ {D:2.54}) pertaining to being made or consisting of bronze, brass, or copper

G3035.def: (derivative of {L:λίθος<SDBG:λίθος:000000>}[a] ‘stone,’ {D:2.23}) pertaining to being made of or consisting of stone

G3585.def: (derivative of {L:ξύλον<SDBG:ξύλον:000000>}[a] ‘wood,’ {D:3.60}) pertaining to being made or consisting of wood

G1410.def: (derivative of {L:δύναμις<SDBG:δύναμις:000000>}[a] ‘ability,’ {D:74.1}) to be able to do or to experience something

G3777.def: a marker of coordinate negativized expressions (combination of the negative particle {L:οὐ<SDBG:οὐ:000000>}[a] {D:69.3}, and the postpositive conjunction {L:τέ<SDBG:τέ:000000>}[a] ‘and,’ {D:89.95}){N:001}

G991.def: to see, frequently in the sense of becoming aware of or taking notice of something{N:001}

10.gl: (in the singular) person, human being, individual

G3340.def: to change one’s way of life as the result of a complete change of thought and attitude with regard to sin and righteousness{N:001}

G1537.def: extension from an area or space, usually with the implication of removal out of a delimited area

G846.def: pertaining to that which is identical to something

G3588.def: a reference to an entity, event, or state, clearly identified by the linguistic or non-linguistic context of the utterance{N:001}

G5408.def: depriving a person of life by illegal, intentional killing

G3777.def: a marker of coordinate negativized expressions (combination of the negative particle {L:οὐ<SDBG:οὐ:000000>}[a] {D:69.3}, and the postpositive conjunction {L:τέ<SDBG:τέ:000000>}[a] ‘and,’ {D:89.95}){N:001}

G5333.def: (derivative of {L:φαρμακεία<SDBG:φαρμακεία:000000>} ‘to practice magic, to engage in sorcery,’ {D:53.100}) one who uses magic and sorcery

G4202.def: to engage in sexual immorality of any kind, often with the implication of prostitution

G2809.def: to take secretly and without permission the property of someone else
